metadata.synopsis: Psychiatrist Ann Hecker (Annabella Sciorra) becomes intrigued by the revelations of Eve Abergray (Deborah Unger), a beautiful patient who indulges in sadomasochistic sexual behavior with her lover. When Ann begins dating the handsome Doug McDowell (Jamey Sheridan), she discovers that he is the man involved with her patient. After Eve is found dead, Ann realizes that she's ventured into a dangerous situation as she begins to suspect that Doug is the murderer.

reviews: Sciorra carries Whispers in the Dark with another of her portraits that blend vulnerability, spirit, intelligence and wiry strength.
A sexy, suspenseful thriller. A great cast
An OK whodunit with a memorable, unintentionally hilarious ending.
